data.strFullDescription:
This is a [b]road trip[/b] game in an almost [b]infinite[/b] random generated [b]desert[/b]. The focus is on [b]freedom[/b], [b]driving[/b], [b]exploration[/b] and [b]immersion[/b]. It has [b]minimal[/b] car [b]maintenance[/b] and [b]survival[/b] elements.

[h2]Infinite Desert, Freedom and Driving:[/h2]

There are [b]no invisible walls[/b] or [b]unable to jump over[/b] small fences, or [b]blinking red "wrong direction" signs[/b] on the hud. The car won't need [i]10-20[/i] liter [b]fuel[/b] over just only a [b]few hundred meters[/b], with a full tank, you could go approximately [b][i]500[/i] kilometers[/b]. If you see a [b]distant big mountain[/b], you can [b]go there[/b] and if you are capable, you can climb it. If you don't like where the [b]mirrors[/b] are facing you can [b]adjust[/b] them however you want or [b]throw[/b] them away while driving at [b]full speed[/b]. If you want to [b]lean[/b] out of the car, or closer to the radio or near anything, [i]you can[/i].
data.strSnippet: Random generated open world semi-post apocalyptic survival car driving game.
